name: @numrs/wasm
description: NumRs WebAssembly bindings for browser and Node.js

scripts.build: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+simd128,+atomics,+bulk-memory -C opt-level=z" wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release --out-dir pkg
scripts.build:web: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+simd128,+atomics,+bulk-memory -C opt-level=z" wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-dir pkg-web
scripts.build:bundler: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+simd128,+atomics,+bulk-memory -C opt-level=z" wasm-pack build --target bundler --release --out-dir pkg-bundler
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:web && npm run build:bundler

author: numrs contributors
